entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4 except plus 3 in a few localities.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12 except minus 4 in a few localities. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 except minus 4 in a few localities. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 08 January 2023
